We are running a sale on some of our dedicated servers. Get power and performance for a fraction of the price.
Basic Server down to $44.99/mo includes:

Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 3.00 Ghz

250 GB Hard Drive

4 GB DDR3 Memory

4 Dedicated IPV4 Ip’s /30 Subnet

Unmetered Redundant Bandwidth 1 Gbps Port

We have Honduras IP available at no extra charge, only specify in your order notes that you need a Honduran ip. Variety of operating systems available, if you don't see the one you need on the order form, just send us a message and we can get it for you. Datacenter located in New Jersey, USA, visit our dedicated server sales page for all the details  http://laceibanetsociety.com/en/dedicated-servers/dedicated-servers-sale/

Support available 24/7 365, Spanish and English speakers. Contact us at marketing@laceibanetsociety.com or live chat on our website for more information
